title: Crispy potato cakes with ham
ingredients: ['4 large potatoes, peeled and finely grated', '1 white onion, grated', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '2 tablespoons butter', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 spring onions, chopped', '110g chopped ham', '2 tablespoons grated Cheddar cheese', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
